required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: In Market Utilisation of Liraglutide Used for Weight Management in the UK: a Study in the CPRD Primary Care Database
clinical_study.official_title: In Market Utilisation of Liraglutide Used for Weight Management in the UK: a Study in the CPRD Primary Care Database

brief_summary.textblock: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this study is to investigate usage of liraglutide for weight management in clinical practice using the CPRD (Clinical Practice Research Datalink) primary care database.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with a BMI above or equal to 30 kg/m^2 (Saxenda® only)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Less than 6 months before the date of the first prescription

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with a BMI above or equal to 27 kg/m^2 and below 30 kg/m^2 and 1 or more comorbidities (Saxenda® only)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Less than 6 months before the date of the first prescription
primary_outcome.description: With at least 1 relevant comorbidity: (Dysglycaemia, hypertension, dyslipidaemia, and/or obstructive sleep apnoe)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with a BMI above or equal to 27 kg/m^2 and less than 30 kg/m^2 and no comorbidities (Saxenda® only)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Less than 6 months before the first prescription
primary_outcome.description: None of the relevant comorbidities: (dysglycaemia, hypertension, dyslipidaemia, and/or obstructive sleep apnoe)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with BMI below 27 kg/m^2 (Saxenda® only)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Less than 6 months before the first prescription

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with less than 5% weight loss and continuing treatment (Saxenda® only)
Mean weight loss in patients not treated according to stopping rule (Saxenda® only)
Number of patients with a BMI not measured (Saxenda® only)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Less than 6 months before the first prescription

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with at least 5% weight loss and continuing treatment (Saxenda® only)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients fulfilling at least one of the following: 1) a prescription interval corresponding to a daily dose of 3.0 mg, 2) dose information of 3.0 mg per day, or 3) indication of weight management (Victoza® only)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 4-12 weeks from the date of the first prescription

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of initiators with other GLP-1 receptor agonists prescribed during continued treatment with Saxenda® (Saxenda® only)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of first prescription until 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Continued treatment is defined as no gaps of more than 30 days between assumed prescription end and the subsequent prescription date

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of initiators with other products for weight management prescribed during continued treatment with Saxenda® (Saxenda® only)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of first prescription until 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Continued treatment is defined as no gaps of more than 30 days between assumed prescription end and the subsequent prescription date

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients who have reached 3.0 mg (Saxenda® only)
Number of patients with a treatment duration of 0-6 months (Saxenda® only)
Number of patients with a treatment duration of 7-12 months (Saxenda® only)
Number of patients with a treatment duration of 13-18 months (Saxenda® only)
Number of patients with a treatment duration of 19-24 months (Saxenda® only)
Number of patients with ongoing treatment (current users) (Saxenda® only)

study_pop.textblock: Patients in the CPRD primary care database who have been prescribed liraglutide after the UK launch of Saxenda® (and have no liraglutide prescriptions in the previous 12 months)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
-New initiators of liraglutide (unbranded, or branded prescription, i.e. Saxenda® or Victoza®), who have no liraglutide prescriptions in the twelve months prior to index date. Patients must be research standard (registered as "acceptable" in the database) with at least one year of up-to-standard registration prior to their index date
Exclusion Criteria:

patient_data.ipd_description: According to the Novo Nordisk disclosure commitment on novonordisk-trials.com
